name: Decorating
description: This is a list of my favorite decoration blocks! This list will grow as I either find more things I like or I've added new mods that contain new blocks to play around with. Eventually I'll be adding photos to each entry so you can visualize them!$(br2)All content of my building guide will be uploaded to my OneNote. $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://1drv.ms/u/s!Atp2GkCazUCzb49PlX2XkJHiyAA)Here's the link
